Projects Work
Shea Molloy //
is interested in technology, art, activism and the environment. She holds a Masters of Science in Data Visualization and a Futures Studies and Speculative Design Certificate from Parsons at The New School.

She is currently working on strategy and research for the Adobe Stock Design Content Team.

Reach out for data and design collaborations, to request tech support for artists, or just to say hello[at]sheamolloy[dot]info

Please share any feedback ⟶
